Detailed Description

CTreeView.

Description: This class contains the graph and trace views used while working on a tree style dataset. It lays out the two views as a QSplitter to give the user control of each one's size. By default the QSplitter holds the views as non-collapsible and so it is recommended that the programmer connect toggle actions to show/hide the views through the connectGraphAction and connectTraceAction functions.

Limitations: None
